When surfing the internet, often we save pictures to our computer. When saving many picture we often click by mistake the "Send image..." instead of "Save image as...." which causes an external program to emerge and practically does not allow the user to continue using the external Email software until it is closed.

Moreover, the "Send image..." function is rarely used, while the "Save image as..." is often used which makes a lot of confusion. When a user saves an image in 99% of the cases the last thing that he/she wants to do is to send the image by Email, and even sending by Email is rarely done using a software, but usually done through the browser itself using websites such as yahoo mail, gmail, etc'


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.surf to a website which contains images
2.Click "Save image as..." and save the image to the local hard drive
3. repeat #1,#2 many times and see in how many cases you click by mistake "Send image"


Expected Results:  
"Save image as..." menu must be far from "Send Image"
comments.author: t8av@yahoo.com
